text:
Hi Community,
Having some issues with a template that not sure how to fix could anyone offer guidance?
1)The HubSpot literally says responsive and is a HS responsive template but does not look responsive at all if view on mobile
<http://5631553.hs-sites.com/-temporary-slug-82d349d0-e080-4b48-bf05-e4f99c666474?hs_preview=fosYplbK-10485931700>
<http://info.os33.com/frontline?hs_preview=xLWegkMO-10296035261>
<@UD53A9UUR> this is the preview link
<@UHGJ1MN14> I can't find what you're showing me. is it under "Edit HubL source"?
are you talking about the banner content?
yes the banner image
i would consider not using an image for the text
that should be your h1
you dont have one of those on your page
does that mean I can't use this template?
and that I have to rebuild the page again?
is there any way around it so I can just keep using this landing page for now?
i would just consider removing the text and red ribbon from the bg and then adding that above it.  then it will respond nicely and you will have better SEO
would I be able to layer the red ribbon on top of the image? and then also layer the text on top of the red ribbon?

you would probably just later an h1 on top.  it is a block element so it will span the entire width of its container, add some padding to top and bottom and have an rgba background with whatever opacity that is
ok I will try this now. thank you.
Good luck!
how do I add the rgb background and specify opacity?
Use rgba
ok but which section do I find it in? don't mean to be annoying but I'm really new to this and don't know many things.

i will only be able to help you out so much..within the parallax banner image section, looks like you have a whole bunch of empty modules.  you could add to  one of those.  maybe take a screengrab of how it looks in your design manager?
I found the background color and opacity. I created a new landing page to test this out. I've worked out the H1. but now I'm finding that the image is still not showing up right.
new preview link - <http://info.os33.com/test123?hs_preview=BjIlFfLH-10496620023>
I created a new page to figure things out
